Text: After examining the file names, I think it is fair to say that this material presents predominantly a collectivist, as distinguished from an individualist point of view. For the latter, try http://freedomforceinternational.org .

Hey Asc11  I've been heavily involved with discussing these ideas, and have yet to have one person characterize them that way, how did you come to that conclusion?  Most of the literature just describes the monetary operations that already exist.   The policy proposals, like to unwind systematically dangerous banks, would increase collective financial stability, is that what you mean?
